thread.title: Busy street, quiet room
thread.title_full: Busy street, quiet room - Review of Hilton Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: lisan850
title: Busy street, quiet room
text: We stayed for 5 nights on floor 43. We enjoyed great views and very little noise. Hotel doesn't have a ton of amenities, but we didn't need them, given that there is so much nearby. Service was mostly good, only a few times indifferent. Rarely had to wait for an elevator. Breakfast buffet was expensive given what it offered, but it was convenient. I'd recommend this hotel.
